Title: Empower Business Users with AI driven insights in Microsoft Fabric | BRK223
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover how Microsoft Fabric empowers business teams by seamlessly connecting data across your organization to drive smarter decisions. In this session, we will cover how Power BI and data agents in Fabric can empower you to be an AI-first organization. Learn how Fabric helps you deliver trusted, AI-powered analytics at scale across the Microsoft ecosystem.
